name: Eversource Energy
description: Eversource Energy is a leading energy company based in the United States, dedicated to providing reliable electric and natural gas services to millions of customers across New England. Formed in 2018 through the merger of Northeast Utilities and NSTAR, Eversource operates in Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire. The company is committed to delivering sustainable energy solutions and investing in innovative infrastructure to meet the growing energy needs of its customers. Eversource focuses on clean energy initiatives, including renewable energy projects and energy efficiency programs, aiming to reduce carbon emissions and promote a sustainable future. With a strong emphasis on customer service, Eversource continuously works to enhance the reliability of its services while engaging in community initiatives and supporting economic development. The company’s vision includes a transition to a cleaner energy future, which involves significant investments in renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power. Eversource is determined to lead the energy industry by prioritizing environmental stewardship and delivering a safe, reliable energy supply to its customers.
